title: A Boss Gets a Big Paycheck
summary: Denise Coates is the boss of Bet365, a company that lets people gamble online. In 2025, she got paid a lot of money—at least £280 million. That's much more than the £158 million she got the year before. Even though Bet365 made less profit, she still earned a big salary and got money from the company's dividends. Over the past ten years, she has earned over £2 billion from Bet365. Some people think her pay is too high because gambling can hurt people. Bet365 started small in a car park in Stoke-on-Trent and now employs many people there. Denise Coates is one of the richest women in Britain and pays a lot in taxes.

background_read: Denise Coates is the founder and boss of Bet365, a big online gambling company. She started it over 20 years ago in a small building in Stoke-on-Trent, and now it employs many people there. Bet365 lets customers bet on sports and play games like poker online. Some people worry that gambling can be harmful, so they think her high pay is not fair. She is one of the richest women in Britain and pays a lot of money in taxes to the government.
Article_Structure: WHO: Denise Coates, the founder and boss of Bet365
WHAT: She got a pay package of at least £280 million in 2025, making her one of Britain's highest-paid bosses
WHERE: Bet365 is based in Stoke-on-Trent, UK, and operates online worldwide
WHY: Her pay is high due to her salary and dividends, but some criticize it because gambling can cause harm

perspectives.description: Denise Coates built Bet365 from scratch, created jobs, and pays taxes, so her high pay rewards her hard work.
Her pay is too high because it comes from gambling, which can hurt people, and no one needs that much money.
